nodes.text: The Nevoota were a group in the galaxy associated with Nevoota stimulant pollen. By 10 BBY, the pirate queen Maz Kanata had included the pollen on a list of the most profitable cargoes for smugglers to carry in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Nevoota were first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018. They originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned as a sentient insectoid species in "The History of the Mandalorians," an article written by Abel G. Peña and published in Star Wars Insider 80 in 2005.
